title: Server suggests to choose nickname to registered user.
body:
I don't know if it's a bug, but....when you are connecting to server, announced via bonjour, it suggests you to choose a nickname, even if you are registered on this server. I think this is unnecessary, because the nickname won't be replaced anyway.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1036/ .
